course_description: Unlock the power of code with Python: a hands-on, zero-to-hero journey that takes you from installing your first interpreter to writing real-world scripts in just one weekend.
course_overview: This immersive beginner course demystifies programming by teaching Python 3 from the ground up. Through bite-sized videos, interactive notebooks, and 30+ mini-projects, you’ll master variables, control flow, functions, lists, dictionaries, file I/O, error handling, and the basics of object-oriented programming. By the end, you’ll have built a portfolio including a password generator, web scraper, and data analyzer, plus the confidence to continue learning intermediate topics like APIs and data science libraries.
target_audience: Absolute beginners aged 14+ who want to learn coding for career switches, academic requirements, automation hobbies, or tech entrepreneurship.
prerequisites: A computer with admin rights to install Python
learning_outcomes: Install and configure Python 3 and VS Code independently
Analyze runtime errors and debug scripts using tracebacks
Design and implement functions with parameters and return values
Create programs that read, process, and write text and CSV files
Apply loops and comprehensions to transform lists and dictionaries
Develop small OO programs with classes and methods
Evaluate alternative algorithms for simplicity and efficiency
Synthesize course skills into a final capstone automation project
